Creators Joel Fields. Joseph Weisberg

Directed by Chris Long. Kevin Bray. Gwyneth Horder-Payton

Written by Joel Fields. Joseph Weisberg

Cast Steve Carell( Alan Strauss10 episodes, 2022 ). Domhnall Gleeson( Sam Fortner10 episodes, 2022 ). Laura Niemi( Beth Strauss10 episodes, 2022 ). Andrew Leeds( Ezra Strauss9 episodes, 2022 ). Linda Emond( Candace Fortner8 episodes, 2022 ). Amy Handelman( Chava / …8 episodes, 2022 ). Alex Rich( Elias7 episodes, 2022 ). Renata Friedman( Shoshana Cohen6 episodes, 2022 ). David Alan Grier( Charlie Addison5 episodes, 2022 ). Luke Patrick Dodge( Menachem Strauss4 episodes, 2022 ). Paxton Booth( Dov Strauss / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Alan Blumenfeld( Chaim Benjamin3 episodes, 2022 ). Jake Broder( Rebbe3 episodes, 2022 ). Josh Covitt( Tom Cohen3 episodes, 2022 ). Levi Allen( (Aiden (Shoshana Child #2) / …3 episodes, 2022 ). Lila Karp-Ziring( Lindsey Cohen / …3 episodes, 2022 ). Lee Bachrach( Yudit (Ezra Child #3) / …3 episodes, 2022 ). Emily Davis( Mary3 episodes, 2022 ). Diane Kelber( Denise Benjamin3 episodes, 2022 ). Tim Ransom( Kyle / …2 episodes, 2022 ). Cassandra Relynn( Jeanette2 episodes, 2022 ). Michael Dempsey( Mr. Buchella2 episodes, 2022 ). Gordon Tarpley( Prisoner2 episodes, 2022 ). Evan Shafran( Concentration Camp Prisoner2 episodes, 2022 ). Lance Guest( Paul1 episode, 2022 ). Robert Arce( Viktor Frankl1 episode, 2022 ). Cindy Michelle( Colleen1 episode, 2022 ). Lucas Grant( Young Ezra Strauss1 episode, 2022 ). Nick Alvarez( Brian1 episode, 2022 ). Morgan Lynn Weir( 7 y / …1 episode, 2022 ). Mark Bloom( Dr. Greenstein1 episode, 2022 ). Jeffrey Sun( Another Coworker1 episode, 2022 ). Charles Anteby(1 episode, 2022 ). David Moskowitz( Hasidic Jew / …1 episode, 2022 ). Eva La Dare( Lynette1 episode, 2022 ). Michael Petrone( Coach Mulrooney1 episode, 2022 ). Menachem Silverstein( Orthodox Man1 episode, 2022 ). Jackson Dollinger( Young Alan Strauss (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Frank Scozzari( Office Worker (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Jeff Galfer( David Strauss (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Brandon Paul Johnson( Ping Pong Player (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Jeremiah Wiseblood( College Student (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). JD Measures( College Student (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Steve Carell. Victor Hsu. Chris Long. Michael Maccarone. Jillian Nordby. Nicole McCormick. Dennis Palumbo. Justin Weinberger. Joel Fields. Caroline Moore. Joseph Weisberg

Production FX Productions. Scallie Filmworks. The Js.

Certificate 18+

Season 1

Episodes 10
